custom_steps_separated.content:
When a banner is published in CMS
and targeted to screen:TeamMainViewController
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the banner will be displayed on the iPhone Team Page

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a banner is published in CMS
and targeted to screen:ScoreboardViewController
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the banner will be displayed on the iPhone Scoreboard

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a banner is published in CMS
and targeted to screen:MediaProgramGuideController
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the banner will be displayed on the iPhone MLB.TV EPG

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a banner is published in CMS
and the type: "image"
and no link: is provided
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the banner will appear
and tapping on the banner will not do anything

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a banner is published in CMS
and the type: "image"
and link:http://www.mlb.com is provided
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the banner will appear
and tapping on the banner will open internal webview to MLB.com

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a banner is published in CMS
and the type:image_external
and link:http://www.mlb.com is provided
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the banner will appear
and tapping on the banner will exit At Bat
and bring the user to MLB.com in external browser

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a banner is published in CMS
and the type:video
and the link:http://mlblive-akc.mlb.com/ls04/mlbam/2015/12/10/MLB_VIDEO_AD_HOC_FMS_Rule_5_Draft_20151210/master_mobile.m3u8
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the banner will appear
and tapping on the banner will open the video player

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a banner is published in CMS
and the type:image
and the webViewtype:3
and link:http://www.mlb.com is provided
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the banner will appear
and tapping on the banner will exit At Bat
and bring the user to MLB.com in external browser

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a banner is published in CMS
and the type:image
and the webViewtype:2
and link:http://www.mlb.com is provided
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the banner will appear
and tapping on the banner will open internal webview to MLB.com
and all webview controls will be available (top and bottom)

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a banner is published in CMS
and the type:image
and the webViewtype:1
and link:http://www.mlb.com is provided
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the banner will appear
and tapping on the banner will open internal webview to MLB.com
and all webview controls will be available on top and bottom except no refresh control

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a banner is published in CMS
and the type:image
and the webViewtype:0
and link:http://www.mlb.com is provided
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the banner will appear
and tapping on the banner will open internal webview to MLB.com
and only top webview controls (Done button) will be available
and no bottom webview controls will be visible

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a banner is published in CMS
and closable:true
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the banner will appear
and the user can tap X to close the banner

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a banner is published in CMS
and closable:false
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the banner will appear
and no X will appear to close the banner

custom_steps_separated.content:
When there is Free Trial enabled in the config
and the app has been freshly installed
and the user taps on the Go to Lite button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then an interstitial page opens with a tappable WebView image (the image will only be tappable if it appears, this is can be modified through the config file)
and the MLB.com logo will appear on the top banner of the interstitial page

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a Free Trail Interstitial page has been loaded
and the Register Button is tapped
custom_steps_separated.expected: The the standard Login/Register flow page will display

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the app has been initially installed
and the user taps the Continue to LIte button
and the user taps on the Skip button on the Free Trial Interstitial
custom_steps_separated.expected: The Add Favorite Team screen appears

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user is a Lite user 
and the app hasn't been installed for the first time
and the user taps on the Free Trial button on the upper left of the Scoreboard
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the Free Trial Interstitial is loaded

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user has Logged In and/or Registered for a Free Trial
and the user selects the Login/Register button
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the Interstitial Ad appears

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user is on the Resister Page through the Free Trial flow
and the opt in label is enabled through the config
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user is able to select/deselect the option

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user unlocked a At Bat free trial and accesses the At Bat app
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will be able to access all the features associated with the At Bat Full paid application
and the user will be able to access Gameday Audio
and the user will be able to access the Gameday tab (Live game)
and the user will be able to access in-game Gameday highlights (Live game)
and the user will be able to access the FGOD and FGOD archives

custom_steps_separated.content: When the same Bamnet account attempts to access the Free Trial
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the Bamnet account is denied access to the Free Trial

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user is on one device
When the user attempts to sign up to a Free Trial on the same device with different Bamnet accounts
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then only the first account is entitled with the Free Trail access and all other attempts on the same device are denied

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user attempts to sign up for a Free Trial with the same Bamnet across multiple devices
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then only the initial Free Trial login is granted access, all others are denied

custom_steps_separated.content:
When Lite is currently being sponsored
and the app has been freshly installed
and the user selects 'Continue to Lite' from the initial paywall
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will get an interstitial for the sponsor
and the interstitial will be tapable
and there will be a continue button below the interstitial
and the continue button will take the user to the Lite version of the application

custom_steps_separated.content:
When we have installed At Bat
and we have launched the Application
and we compare the Light Sponsorship
and we compare the Free Trial sponsorship
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then we will see that both contain a Thin top Banner on the Scoreboard
and we will see that all normal Ad Marvel banners are present as well
and we will see that both contain the full page interstitial

custom_steps_separated.content:
When you have purchased the app through In-App Purchase on QA
and the MLB.TV Free Trial is enabled in the config
and you are on the Scoreboard
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then you will see the MLB.TV Free Trial button on the upper left of the Scoreboard

custom_steps_separated.content:
When you are an app entitled user
and you are on the Scoreboard
and you tap on the Free Trial button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the Free Trial interstitial page is displayed
and there are Cancel and Register buttons at the bottom of the page

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the trial button is pressed to launch the interstitial page
and the page is displayed
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then there is company branding for the appropriate sponsor

custom_steps_separated.content:
When you have tapped on the Free Trial button on the Scoreboard
and the Cancel button is tapped on the interstitial page
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the interstitial page is dismissed

custom_steps_separated.content:
When you have tapped on the Free Trial button on the Scoreboard or on the MLB.TV paywall
and the interstitial page is launched
and the Register button is tapped
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the Login/Register window is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: When the opt-in value is enabled in the config
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then you will see the opt-in label on the Login and Register screens

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the Login/Register page is displayed
and the Login username and password sections ware filled out with an existing Bamnet account that was Linked to an app entitled account
and the Log In button is tapped
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be signed up for the MLB.TV Free Trial for the defined time

custom_steps_separated.content:
When you are the Login/Register page
and you tap on the Register button on top
and fills out the required fields
and taps on the blue Register button at the bottom of the form
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user is signed up to the MLB.TV Free Trial

custom_steps_separated.content:
When there is Free Game of the Day
and a Free trial is enabled through the config
and the app entitled user tries to access this game
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user is grated access to the MLB.TV feed

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user has signed up the MLB.TV Free Trial
and the user accesses an MLB.TV feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the users sees a Sponsorship branded Play Ball screen

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user is attempting to sign up to the free tv trial
and uses the same account that has been previously signed up
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be denied access to the free trial

custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will not see an MLB.TV upsell banner

custom_steps_separated.content: on an iPhone with Single Team and At Bat account
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will not see an MLB.TV upsell banner

custom_steps_separated.content: on an iPhone as MLB.TV account
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will not see an MLB.TV upsell banner

title: Gameday Changes for Lite Users
custom_preconds:
Homebase or Ad-Ops Banner Support - ConfigExtras, adSupportForScreen, AdMarvel 

iOS At Bat iPhone QA Site ID: 5225
iOS At Bat iPhone PROD Site ID: 3275
iOS At Bat iPad QA Site ID: 11198
iOS At Bat iPad PROD Site ID: 3276

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a banner is configured for Gameday
and a lite user is on Gameday Screen for a game in progress
and the game is in mid or end of a inning
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see an ad banner with a X

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a game is in progress in the mid or end of an inning
and the ad banner is on the screen
and the user taps on the X
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will have to dismiss the ad and the user will be returned to Gmaeday

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a mid or end inning interstitial ad appears
and the next inning starts
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the interstitial dismisses and Gameday will update

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a banner is configured for Gameday
and a lite user is on another screen (not Gameday) for a game in progress
and the game is in mid or end of a inning
custom_steps_separated.expected: The user will not see a banner

title: Ads
custom_preconds:
Given a user has a local copy of configextraslite for iPad and iPhone
and use Charles to override the configExtrasLite
custom_steps: When a user is in iOS At Bat

custom_steps_separated.content: when shouldKillDFPAds is set to true in configExtrasLite
custom_steps_separated.expected: no DFP Ads will be seen

custom_steps_separated.content: when shouldKillNativeAds is set to true in configExtrasLite
custom_steps_separated.expected:
no Facebook Native Ads will be seen on the iPhone Newsreader

(Facebook installed and logged into on the device)

custom_steps_separated.content: when shouldKillAllAds is set to true in configExtrasLite
custom_steps_separated.expected: no ads will be seen regardless of type

title: Updated Splash Screen -> With Sponsor -> 3 Second Splash Screen
custom_preconds:
* User has latest build downloaded
* Sponsor is active
custom_steps:
GIVEN that the app is launched from a cold start
WHEN the splash screen is displayed
AND there is a paying sponsor
custom_expected:
THEN the splash screen will display for at least 3 seconds 
AND the user will see sponsor at the bottom of the page. EG-"Presented by Camping World"

title: Updated Splash Screen -> Without Sponsor
custom_preconds:
* User has latest build downloaded
* No Sponsor is active
custom_steps:
GIVEN that the app is launched from a cold start
WHEN the splash screen is displayed
AND there is not a paying sponsor
custom_expected: THEN the splash screen will display for at least 1.5 seconds (depending on network)
